1881 di kamkaru nayakayan ekathuwa “sanwidhanathmaka sewawanhi wruththiya samithi sammelanaya“ lesa sakachjawata wada wu satankami piliwethak athi sanwidhanayak bihi kala atharama wishala lesa kamkaruwan eya wata ekathu wiya.
susa sandhyage diyaniyak kiyala danne golu chaplin witharayi.me okkoma asse ambailipitiye ‘kara’ nasiwaththata kada paninawa.

inpasuwa kalak sinhala shabdakoshaye upa sanskarakawarayeku widihatath katayuthu kala ohuta, keti kalayakin lanka wishwawidyalaye kathikacharya thanathurak labuna. 1949 di landan wishwawidyalayen aacharya upadhiyath, darshanapathi upadhiyath lada sarachchandra 1952 di peradeniya wishwawidyalayata pathwimak labuwa. 1965 marthu masaye lalitha swarna perera samaga wiwapath wunu sarachchandra, nanditha, sunethra, kisagothami, yashodhara saha ransi nam diyaniyan pas denekuge piyek.
